content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Oil extraction setup at position(17.5, 40.5)
Consists of a pumpjack at position(17.5, 40.5), a small electric pole at position(19.5, 40.5), a storage tank at position(21.5, 43.5), and a pipe group connecting the pumpjack to the storage tank with pipes at positions (19.5, 38.5), (18.5, 38.5), (20.5, 39.5), (20.5, 38.5), (20.5, 41.5), and (20.5, 40.5).

### Boiler setup at position(12.5, 41.0)
Consists of a boiler at position(12.5, 41.0)

### Electricity generator at position(7.5, 40.5)
Consists of a steam engine at position(7.5, 40.5)

### Oil refinery setup at position(26.5, 45.5)
Consists of an oil refinery at position(26.5, 45.5) and is connected to the oil extraction setup via a pipe group and to the electricity network via a small electric pole at position(24.5, 42.5)

## ERROR TIPS
### Errors when connecting entities without fluid
- Ensure that the source entity has fluid in it before connecting it to an entity that requires fluid input.

### Errors when using undefined attributes
- Make sure to use the correct attributes for an entity. Check the entity's documentation for available attributes.

### Errors when inspecting inventory of entities
- Verify that the entity's inventory is accessible before attempting to inspect it.

### Errors when entities are not receiving power
- Check the power connection and ensure that the entity is properly connected to a power source.

### Errors when placing entities or connecting entities
- Ensure the target location is buildable and not occupied by another entity or water before attempting to place an entity or connect entities.

## NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
